name: Create a new stories by id of project with only name

steps.name: Given I set up a "POST" request to "/projects/{proj_id}/stories" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I should see a messages error: One or more request parameters was missing or invalid.
And I Should see the problem: 'name' must be an extended_string

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional test Negative cases of stories for create
